Question & Options:
Which actresses were considered for the female lead opposite Hrithik Roshan in *Yaadein*?
Options:
A. A) Ameesha Patel
B. B) Kareena Kapoor
C. C) Priyanka Chopra
D. D) All of the above
Correct Answer: A) Ameesha Patel, B) Kareena Kapoor

Question & Options:
Which statements are true regarding the casting and performance of the movie featuring Kareena Kapoor and Hrithik Roshan?
Options:
A. A) Kareena Kapoor was the leading lady opposite Hrithik Roshan.
B. B) Ameesha Patel was originally considered for the female lead.
C. C) The movie featuring Kareena Kapoor and Hrithik Roshan was a box office success.
D. D) The movie featuring Hrithik Roshan and Kareena Kapoor was a box office failure.
Correct Answer: A) Kareena Kapoor was the leading lady opposite Hrithik Roshan., B) Ameesha Patel was originally considered for the female lead., D) The movie featuring Hrithik Roshan and Kareena Kapoor was a box office failure.
